meanings.definition: An entrance or opening into a building or room.
meanings.sent1: The doorway to the classroom was wide and welcoming.
meanings.sent2: Please remember to close the doorway behind you.
meanings.sent3: The doorway seemed to play hide-and-seek with anyone trying to find it.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was the doorway to her warm and friendly personality.
meanings.sent5: The mysterious doorway led to a magical world beyond.

meanings.definition: A threshold or point of entry.
meanings.sent1: Stepping through the doorway, she felt a sense of anticipation.
meanings.sent2: The doorway between the two rooms was always kept open.
meanings.sent3: The doorway became a battleground for the playful kittens.
meanings.sent4: His laughter was the doorway to a room full of joy and happiness.
meanings.sent5: The old, creaky doorway held memories of countless comings and goings.
